source.sqlReaderQuery: select distinct BatchNo from [dbo].[Workspaces_batch] ORDER BY 1

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT DISTINCT BatchNo, TenantId 
FROM [dbo].[Workspaces_batch] 
WHERE TenantId = ', string(pipeline().parameters.TenantId), 
' ORDER BY 1')

activities.name: Capturing Status in WorkSpaces Users History

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat (
    'EXEC [dbo].[sp_ChildPipelineLog_Insert] ',
    '''', 'Started', '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().Pipeline, '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().RunId, '''', ',',
    '''', convertTimeZone(utcnow(),'UTC','India Standard Time'), '''', ',',
    '''', '', '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().TriggerName, '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().TriggerType, '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().TriggerTime, '''', ',',
    '''', ' ', '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().parameters.TenantId, '''', ',',
    '''', ' ', '''', ',',
    '''', ' ', ''''
)

dependsOn.activity: Capturing Status in WorkSpaces Users History

value.value:
@if(and(

equals(variables('Get WorkSpaces Batch Status'),'Succeeded'),
equals(variables('WorkSpacesUsers History Status'),'Succeeded')),

'Succeeded','Failed')

value.value:

equals(variables('Datasets Batches Status'),'Succeeded')),

'Succeeded','Failed')

FROM [dbo].[Reports_batch]
ORDER BY 1

@concat (
    'EXEC [dbo].[sp_ChildPipelineLog_Insert] ',
    '''', 'Started', '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().Pipeline, '''', ',',
    '''', pipeline().RunId, '''', ',',
    '''', convertTimeZone(utcnow(),'UTC','India Standard Time'), '''', ',',

select TenantId,AppClientId,AppTenantId,AppClientSecret,CreatedAt from [dbo].[ClientInformation] 
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC
OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 1 ROW 
ONLY;

ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC
